modernize-deprecated-ios-base-aliases.description:
Description

Detects usage of the deprecated member types of
std::ios_base
and replaces
those that have a non-deprecated equivalent.

Deprecated member type
Replacement
std::ios_base::io_state
std::ios_base::iostate
std::ios_base::open_mode
std::ios_base::openmode
std::ios_base::seek_dir
std::ios_base::seekdir
std::ios_base::streamoff
std::ios_base::streampos
modernize-deprecated-ios-base-aliases.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
